thread.title: Great Hotel in a Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in a Great Location - Review of Hotel Opera Marigny, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: aggienmmi2
title: Great Hotel in a Great Location
text: There is really nothing bad to say about this hotel. The staff was very nice and accommodating. Some had better English than others but it was manageable. The room was small but standard for Europe. The location is excellent, with only a 4 minute walk to a major subway line and about 6 minute walk to a train station that takes you to Versailles. We very much enjoyed our stay here.
